website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use USB 3.0 hub with 4 ports, each of which has its own separate power switch for control.
pros: Easy to see if ports are working, thanks to individual LED lights for each port
Includes an extra port that can be used for charging devices like tablets quickly
Lightweight model that's easy to carry anywhere
Provides good performance for the price
cons: Questionable longevity for this USB 3.0 hub

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my gaming pc so id hav extra ports & ones that u cud turn on & off wothout unplugging the usb device that is plugged into it. Was having a prob with my usb gaming controller causing problems when left plugged in when i hibernate my pc & later turn it back on. This solves that thru the on/off function so my controller acts fine now! :)
customer_reviews.author: Dooner

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: • the unit itself plugs into usb socket on your computer/laptop. no need for another power cord or connector cord. • has 4 usb port for use; each socket can be turned on/off with the push of a button. • when the 4usb port is "on", the blue light around the port lights up. (on mine, the left 2 ports are on, the right two ports are off) • has a fast-charge usb port for charging phones etc -- but for that, you have to plug in a dc 5v power plug (not included).
customer_reviews.author: Kendi

customer_reviews.title: works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: works great for the price, no problems at all.. love the lights.. dont think those are off buttons though. but works perfectly, thankyou edit*** Reduced to 1 star, 3.0 stopped working, I think there is a short in the cord. No longer allows my side sync app from my s8 to mirror to my computer. Was working fine recently just stopped. Only 2.0 items work properly. I've tried new cords with my phone connecting to it.. still doesn't work. I get an error message stating I don't have a solid connection. If I move the hub and cord a certain way and hold it there it seems to work
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Good cord for when needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cord to extend the cord for my Vector’s home reach and had the benefit of more USB ports. It’s a very nice feature to be able to hold down the power buttons to turn off a port when it’s not in use as the lights on the ports can be a little bright when trying to sleep. The single port that doesn’t have a light is good for the one item you want to have power at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Suttles

customer_reviews.title: Favorite USB hub, solid build quality, on/off toggle switch is more useful than you'd think, wish it came with a power adapter.
customer_reviews.text: Favorite USB hub, hands down the build quality is there, the on/off toggle switch for each individual port is nice because I can simply turn off my bluetooth USB unit when I'm not using it, or use an external USB hard drive as a hot swap without having to unplug it, just eject the drive, push the button, swap in another hard drive, push the little button and you're golden. I do wish it came with a power adapter, the original reason I got it was for the high power charging slot which I haven't used yet.
customer_reviews.author: akula

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect well
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, how frustrated this device makes me! All set up, cord is the right length, all devices securely seated. But as soon as I plug the extender into my laptop, off go all the bells. My laptop continuously gives me the "device has just been plugged/unplugged" noises over and over and over. I've firmly reseated everything, rebooted the laptop, etc. My phone and other usb driven devices don't seem to blip on power, but something keeps telling my laptop that it's not connected, then it is connected, then it's not connected, then it is... You get the idea. This one's going back, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not really a charger, really just a hub
customer_reviews.text: Why offer a port to charge devices if it won't work without an adapter. Just make a hub. Or include the adapter. The hub works fine, but as soon as I plugged my phone in, not only did it not charge it shut down the whole hub. Pretty useless! So now I have to decide should i buy the adapter, return it or just keep for the ports. The cord is kind of awkward for my set up, so that may be the deciding factor. But I am disappointed in this device.
customer_reviews.author: lucysky

customer_reviews.title: No AC Adapter
customer_reviews.text: It says in the title No AC Adapter at the very end. I hate this kind of deception.
customer_reviews.author: Noteworthy

customer_reviews.title: This one is great! I attached three external drives and a mouse ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other hubs with little success! This one is great! I attached three external drives and a mouse and everything worked without a hitch! I went and bought another hub, a USB 2.0 and tried to connect the same and nothing worked! This product is amazing and the price makes it worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Randi Odierno

customer_reviews.title: Atolla 4 port USB hub
customer_reviews.text: 2 days after connecting to my computer one of the USB ports stopped working and the blue LED back lights are starting to fail. Based on my experience, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Awesome usb splitter!
customer_reviews.text: Love this device! I have 3 of them. I use it in the car for the kids and everyone’s devices. I use my 2nd one at my deck at work for all my devices and desk fans, mouse, and key board and printer. And the third one sits on my island in my kitchen for anyone and everyone to use. Highly recommend this to anyone looking to charge more than one at a time and to charge fast!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Works great & as advertised. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Expanded my single USB 3.0 port into 4x availability. Now my external HDs are faster. Good HD 1080p cam quality. Love the on/off buttons for each port! The charging port is a plus, not interfering with your connections. Haven't tried the adapter for the charging port yet. If I do, I'll update this. 05/2020 - Now I've added another 7 port Atolla hub and put adapters on each. I couldn't be happier! The charging ports come in super handy and they charge at 2A. I've turned 2 USB 3.0 ports into THIRTEEN with these adapters. Speed and reliability is excellent. I would buy this brand and from this seller again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Vyn Sonn

customer_reviews.title: These USB blocks are so great I gave one to my landlady!
customer_reviews.text: Of course, there are several products nearly like this. this one is special because it has switches on each of the 4 plug-ins and a led blue light that indicates when the particular USB plug's power is on. It also has an end input for charging a device via USB. They are really cool! I have two of them for my recording studio. I cut strips of stick-on velcro to put on the unit and on a surface in order to mount them in convenient areas. The switches are extra good because you don't have to keep plugging your drives in and pulling them out. You just hold the switch until the light goes out. A good, solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard 'Sandy' Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Now you see it; now you don't.
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently purchased this as a replacement for an Atolla I have used for several years but had been dropped and broken. From the beginning I have had nothing but problems, either it wasn't available when I went to save my files or it was available but winked on and off so that I had to wait for it to become available again. It was more off than on making my file management a nightmare. I'm looking for a reliable replacement but in the meantime my frustration is becoming as consistent as this product's inconsistencies.
customer_reviews.author: L. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Windows 10 stopped recognizing this after 5 months. Tried also on Windows 8 on another laptop - the same thing. Windows says that the device malfunctioned and was shut down by Windows. Update: The guys from the company called me and did all they could to solve the problem. Eventually, we realized that the item was defective. They sent the replacement, which is working now. Remains to be seen if this one will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: My new HP all-in-one desktop has all its ports in the back (I should have noticed this when I bought it) -- and not enough of them to support my iPod, my wireless mouse, my earbuds and keyboard USBs. This little hub is the answer! The best part, is that you can shut off the ones not being used. The port at the end of the unit (plug in #5) is perfect for charging my phone. You get a LOT for the price on this little thing.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: Works with the Tesla Model 3 + USB Drive + Nomad wireless charger
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use the dashcam recording feature of the Tesla Model 3. I also have a Nomad wireless charger. Using both the charger and the Samsung BAR Plus 128GB USB drive, I've had no issues so far (as in data corruption or charging issues).
customer_reviews.author: Theo Gravity

customer_reviews.title: Atolla 4 Ports Super Speed USB in February 2017
customer_reviews.text: Purchased USB 3.0 Hub, Atolla 4 Ports Super Speed USB in February 2017. The fourth insert(on the USB charging end)no longer works and the LED continues to flash. One of the main reasons for buying this unit was the ability to insert all four ports on top. Disappointed it only lasted 7 months. Emailed Atolla about warranty. They responded immediately with a new unit @ no charge after emailing a copy of the Amazon order. Works great!!! Really impressed with the service and the people handing it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a year then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The USB Hub worked well for the first year and then it started to stop working. I lost a lot of data and can't trust it again. I used it occasionally so it was not daily usage. I traveled with it and set up my portable office a couple times a month. Consider the initial purchase cost and then having to replace it every year. I'll select a different one.
customer_reviews.author: TIM TORBENSON

customer_reviews.title: Catered at the press of a button
customer_reviews.text: This item is helping me allot in my vehicle, I can charge my cell, usb rechargeable flashlight, turn on or off my radar detector, there is no more need to keep things turned on unnecessarily, they can be turned off at any time. Like the dimmed lighted feature to verify if it's on or off day or night. Only issue I have is that the on and off button switch is too flush to the surface, it could help to have the button switch coming out the surface a little higher, regardless it still serves its purpose well in my book.
customer_reviews.author: D'ALCI

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for 1st World Problem
customer_reviews.text: I have an HP all-in-one and the USB ports are on the back - it's quite inconvenient. I bought one of these for a USB drive that I put in and remove frequently. This does the trick. I also bought another for my Surface Pro because I use a wireless mouse (USB) and a smart card reader (USB) and sometimes a phone charger (USB). This device lets me split the one Surface Pro USB port for all three needs. I also like that I can turn on and off the USB-respective power on the splitter when I'm not using a specific USB.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Long cord is a great feature,
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I love it. The long cord is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: RBINCC

customer_reviews.title: Prevent Malware from getting to your backup disk drive
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent device. It works well and is easy to use. My recommended use for it is to connect your backup disk drive to it and when your computer system is not backing up your files disconnect the drive. Only connect the drive when backing up files. This prevents malware from getting to your backup drive when you are connected to the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Life is much easier now!!
customer_reviews.text: This splitter works great. The cord is a little longer than expected, but not really a problem. Now I am able to work on several projects at one time and not have to take out one memory stick to replace it with another. The bright blue light is a little annoying for my eyes, but I just put the splitter to the side of my laptop where I do not see it. I am very happy with the purchase and would recommend it to anyone who uses memory sticks or needs to charge devices while using memory sticks and runs out of USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: OkieReader

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: All 4 ports work, charging through the charging port is slower than on ac power, but it delivers. I can even charge devices with my computer turned off though I avoid doing this, not sure what sort of strain it'll put on my motherboard. I don't see the point to having power buttons for USB ports but I'm not bothered by them. Good product that seem to be able to last. Will buy again if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Not for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Only charged 1 phone it would shut off when I would plug in another charger and lights would blink. UPDATE- Found out this is not for charging your phones in your car if you have usb connection. My mistake. Seller was so nice to refund me my money with no problems what so ever. Awesome communication and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for PS4, works great
customer_reviews.text: Really cool USB splitter. My PS4 only has two slots and I'm using one for my external hard drive. It really sucked whenever I needed to charge my controller since I'd use the other free slot for my wireless headset. The USB splitter works super well and I love that you can just turn the power on/ off for the specific slots. The cable on the splitter could be a little bit longer but is still good compared to some others I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie K

customer_reviews.title: Preferred by our office
customer_reviews.text: We put these hubs on all of our work stations at the office and we have not had any problems with them. It works with downloading files from phones, flash drives, etc. Not the best for charging phones but you can read files from it. Compact so it doesn't take up too much space on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Spoiled Rott'n

customer_reviews.title: Cuts out
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this hub for a while now and am finally frustrated enough to replace it. With my old setup it would cut out if it was touched even slightly (kicking me off of my second monitor constantly). Now I have a new setup and it just randomly will cut without being touched at all, multiple times. It makes using my second monitor near impossible while working remotely. I think there is a short or bad wire. Don't expect anything long lasting or great with this. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE being able to plug all of my USB cords ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE being able to plug all of my USB cords into one place. I use my laptop on a desk with an additional monitor most of the time, but I do also like to sit on the couch with my laptop. It's nice to be able to just unhook this one USB instead of all those cords individually. I've noticed that my phone definitely charges faster if I'm using the cord plugged into the "charger" port than just one plugged into a regular USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I don't care what the negative reviews say. As I type this my 2TB portable Seagate drive is connected and running, my Samsung Galaxy S5 smart phone is chargingand the 2 thumb drives in the remaining ports are working fine. All with NO external power source. I may order another just because the price is so right :)
customer_reviews.author: John H. Power

customer_reviews.title: This 4 port USB hub with on/off blue lighting indicators has excellent performance.
customer_reviews.text: This 4 port USB hub with 5th connector labeled charging is fantastic. It is a plus to have on/off button indicators and the less technical, but aesthetically pleasing blue lighting. I believe it would have benefited had it included an Ethernet port like the similar 3 port unit. Perhaps in place of the 5th USB port on the end labeled Charging. Although, there may have been some technical restrictions. It does not detract from this unit's excellent performance.
customer_reviews.author: ReconVet

customer_reviews.title: ... for my office so the wireless mouse could reach better. It stays on my desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office so the wireless mouse could reach better. It stays on my desk, without falling down and I can use whatever ports I need instead of turning them all on at once. It's well hidden, blends in great and has a long enough cord to reach my computer and desk. This is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: SheShe19

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Lights
customer_reviews.text: It works and it works well. I use it for phone charging, wireless accessories, and data transfers. My complaint is the blue lighting. My wife hated this in the bedroom because the luminescence kept her awake. Honestly, it's like a nightlight. So I bought a similar product by ATOLLA without lights for charging our devices and this is now part of my office setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it one day, but so far it has been great & works as described. I have a laptop at work with only 2 usb ports. I have a small desk fan that has a usb plug, can charge my phone & earbuds & still have porta available for memory sticks. I like that I can turn them off when I'm not using them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Young

customer_reviews.title: ac adapter
customer_reviews.text: The statement: With AC power adapter applied, it provides up to 2.4Amps, ideal for iPads, iPhones, and other devices. it implies the AC adapter is included. it is NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Video Editing
customer_reviews.text: I just graduated from film school and was editing some footage with a friend and noticed that my two port on my Mac laptop was not enough. This is a great alternative, I would recommend it. I have connected a backup 3TB drive with another 1TB drive along with others and my phone!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and portable,  but seems to slow things down
customer_reviews.text: The Microsoft Surface Pro 6 only has one USB port, and I needed more. It seems that anything attached with this product runs slower. It is meeting my immediate needs, but I’ll probably upgrade to a higher quality one for everyday use. This will definitely be useful for travel, and it is very lightweight and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I’m down to one working port on my laptop, so I bought this to add additional ports. It works perfectly, I love that you can turn off the ports you’re not using. The blue glow from the ports looks beautiful, and the extra charging port for my phone is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: gimmieslurpees

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. I love it when a product does what it says it will
customer_reviews.text: I am able to use this to turn off/on my USB devices easily. The lights on it let you know when a port is active. For instance, I can instantly see if my USB web cam is enabled. I really appreciate that this product does exactly what it says which is exactly what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andre LaPlume

customer_reviews.title: Awesome usb splitter
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. It’s awesome to be able to have multiple things plugged into my laptop besides what’s my 2 USB ports on my lap top. I love that I can have different items plug in and they individually can be turned off. I love the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzi

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my truck
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my truck for all the electronics my kids use in the back seat. It works great, and charges my phone too. For whatever reason the front charger in my truck doesn't work great, but the in-console does, and this allows me to tap that.
customer_reviews.author: Gecko T

customer_reviews.title: Best hub I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome hub. It works all my usb sticks & external HDD at same time to transfer files,which my old hub barely recognized,the individual switches let's me finally unplug the HDD without shutting down my laptop & cord length is great.
customer_reviews.author: tanecl (xbox tag)

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Only port on side worked so effectively a one port device.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's laptop doesnt have enough USB ports to plug in a separate mouse and keyboard so I purchased this extender. I like that I can turn each port off when not in use. So far, it's working well. I hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very very very good product
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE. After receiving the new replacement And testing it for over the past week non stop The truth I am very impressed with the new updates and the new upgrades very good. And thank you for making it right Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Hold button for 2 secs to turn off. No accidents!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I like that you have to hold the button down for 2 seconds to turn off. No accidents. I use all four ports plus I charge my phone with the top port. I also use a wireless mouse and keyboard, webcam, and stand with light. All work fine. I do have it plugged into a USB 3.0. Decent cord length. Plus fits into a charger box as well and functions well. Great size.
customer_reviews.author: Leota Camry

customer_reviews.title: 4 ports plus addl for exclusively charging
customer_reviews.text: Like that each port can be turned on/off, with exception of charging port. Hadn't considered using it for travel purposes but this would be great - compact and convenient cord length. For home office, would have preferred the hookup to be longer so cord length is 4 stars for that purpose. Overall though, 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plugged in and worked immediately
customer_reviews.text: I needed this as my new laptop didn't have enough USB for all the minimum peripherals. Right now I have my keyboard and mouse bluetooth connected to it. I just plugged it into my computer, and my mouse and keyboard worked right away without having to mess with anything. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this regularly with both an external SSD drive and mouse as my convertible ultrabook only has 1 USB 3 slot. Works great with no external power needed for these 2 devices. I really like that this product has the option to add an external power adapter if needed. Overall I thought this was a great quality product at a reasonable price. It's well made and I also like that you can turn each slot on or off independently.
customer_reviews.author: robert f.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This hub works fine at USB 3.0 speeds. Not sure how much I'll use the on/off switches for the ports, but it does what it says it will do. Cord isn't terribly long, but I had a spare USB 3.0 cord which works fine for me to be able to put this on my desktop a bit away from my computer unit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cool

customer_reviews.title: Extension USB at your fingertips
customer_reviews.text: Great extension USB hub at your fingertips, just what I needed, I only have one port of USB on my laptop that I use to every day, got it and it works great, I love having the option to turn some ports off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed and efficient USB multi-outlet in addition to a charger. I filled up all the USB ports on my iMac and had to unplug something temporarily every time I had to plug in a memory stick or something else. Now it's done with ease!
customer_reviews.author: John Yaeger

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and it didn't work, just got the second one and it doesn't work too, would return them both and get a different brand, you can skip this brand and don't waste time on waiting and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Georgi

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. They do not work. They charge and drop charge sporadically. Completely unreliable. I can’t even charge one device- let alone multiple- without it deciding to stop charging within a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome because I said so.
customer_reviews.text: I have millions of things to plug in all at once (I also have all my tabs open on my browser, and at least two other programs running). So I can keep them plugged in and handy but this allows you to TURN OFF the port when not in use. So I sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.B.

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Of PC/Phone Storage
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for more than a year and it works. I even still have a port left to use since I use the attached multi-port USB 3 sticks. It also has a power port in the front to use for another device's charging. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Solved a problem I didn't know was solvable!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I no longer need to remove something to add an external drive, it also makes switching back and forth from my personal to work laptops easier as I only need to remove/move one plug.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Usack

customer_reviews.title: Set on its side..
customer_reviews.text: I set the hub on its side and found it easy to plug peripherals into it, while also using the on/off switches. The device remembers which ports on on after powering off and back on again. I like the blue on indicators.
customer_reviews.author: Reme Pullicar

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product when using multiple thumb drives. Like the fact the USB is inserted on the top rather than the side. The side products that I have used sometime do not have space enough between the inserts to insert.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Hood

customer_reviews.title: Good device
customer_reviews.text: Quite handy, glad I got it and don't have to search for adapters anymore. One port charges my galaxi s9 phone with USB-C, others work well for only for devices with plane usb ports.
customer_reviews.author: mmk

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built unit. It exceeds any use for extra ports. The leds make it easy to see in the dark for plugging in new devices. I recommend buying this unit anytime
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice USB Hub that Works with PS4
customer_reviews.text: This USB hub works great especially with my PS4. My only complaint is or maybe I haven’t figured it out but you can’t tell if the button is on or off except for if the thing plugged into that USB is charging and or on. That’s ok though it’s still an awesome USB hub.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Tello

customer_reviews.title: 4 Ports Super Speed USB 3 Hub Splitter With On Off Switch
customer_reviews.text: The hub serves its purpose perfectly, allowing us to power on up to 4 USB devices or turn them off one at a time. You do need to press the power button for a few seconds to cycle the power to the port, but I feel this is more of a way to keep users from bumping the switch and shutting the port off by accident. Unit Works great!
customer_reviews.author: FredSanchez

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but on/off switch could be better
customer_reviews.text: I needed an on/off switch for a USB hub, but the way they designed the switch is not what I had in mind. It works though, but I wish it was recessed when pressed down to turn on, like a spring switch.
customer_reviews.author: MasterSushi

customer_reviews.title: Atolla Rock and Rolla
customer_reviews.text: I liked this with my macbook pro 2015 15" so much I got one for my mom's iMac. She likes it too but since I do a lot more hardware stuff I get more out of it. Love the individual switches w/ LEDs. Looks good too. I run a printer, control surface for audio recording, MIDI keyboard as well as charging various devices. I only had mine a month so we'll see how long it lasts but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: GopherBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great design; compatible with older USB devices!
customer_reviews.text: Space-saving footprint AND energy-saving features for unused ports. Best surprise: reverse-compatible with USB reliant devices; e.g., old DVD drive, old cell phone cable. Also does NOT interfere with. function of newest model of Logitech wireless keyboard & mouse.
customer_reviews.author: villageRN

customer_reviews.title: Solves the problems it needed to and then some
customer_reviews.text: Works great for helping me plus a bunch of stuff into my laptop. I have multiple devices including but not limited to a drawing tablet, a mouse, a keyboard, and headphones that all need USB to connect, and these hubs make it so that all my devices can go into the two ports my laptop comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Snowka

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it does not require power supply
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and you can also daisy chain another twin device. You can shutdown some of the ports individually if necessary. Very well packaged too. This is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works On PS4 with Multiple PS4 items plugged.
customer_reviews.text: Works Great on Gen 1 PS4, Was able to run Wireless/Dongled Split Fish Controller & Sony Platinum wireless/dongled Headphones. Love how I can control which USB port receives power.
customer_reviews.author: christopher A.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for PS4!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best for my PS4 S. I use an external harddrive, 2 charging cables, and a usb receiver for my wireless headset. The PS4 S only provides 2 usb ports, but with this I can use 6. There's a nice feature of powering off the usb ports when you don't use or need them. The cord length on the hub is kinda long (~3 ft). It's not bad but I don't need that much cord space for a hub.
